tooltips.workTime: Enter the duration of the work phase
tooltips.breakTime: Enter the duration of the short break phase
tooltips.longBreakTime: Enter the duration of the long break phase
tooltips.forceLongBreak: After 4 iterations of work, do you want a long break to happen automatically?
tooltips.sound: Should sound be turned on in the app?
tooltips.autoplay: At the end of each phase, should the countdown of the next phase start automatically?
